Name: Abu Bakr
Relationship with Muhammad PBUH: Father of Aisha, Muhammad's Sallallahu 'Alaihi Wa Salam wife

Name: Umar
Relationship with Muhammad PBUH: Father of Hafsa, Muhammad's Sallallahu 'Alaihi Wa Salam wife

Name: Uthman
Reigned until: 20 June 656(assassinated at the end of a siege upon his house; see First Fitna)
Relationship with Muhammad PBUH: Husband of Muhammad's Sallallahu 'Alaihi Wa Salam daughters, Ruqayya and later Umm Kulthum, and grandson of Muhammad's paternal aunt

Name: Ali
Reigned until: 29 January 661(assassinated while praying in the Mosque of Kufa; see First Fitna)
Relationship with Muhammad PBUH: Muhammad's Sallallahu 'Alaihi Wa Salam cousin, and husband of Fatimah, Muhammad's Sallallahu 'Alaihi Wa Salam daughter, and Umamah bint Zainab, Muhammad's Sallallahu 'Alaihi Wa Salam granddaughter
